title: Broke position the form "Components check"
author: sli-pro
body_snippet:
**Operating system windows 10 64bit.
mRemoteNG 1.76.8.17254 portable**

If you press "Tools/Components Check", the position of the form changes.
Then other forms too open don't correctly.

![1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/38104048/44626067-2420a680-a91f-11e8-8b00-ed3b1a01a70c.png)

![2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/38104048/44626069-2a168780-a91f-11e8-8778-320e5953e0a5.png)
